content.question: A recent study of 1,215 randomly selected middle school students revealed that the average number of minutes they spent completing homework during the school week was 180 minutes with a standard deviation of 45 minutes. Which of the following is the standard error, in minutes, of the sampling distribution of the mean number of minutes spent on homework per week for all middle school students?

choices.label: <math alttext="the square root of the fraction with numerator 45 times 55, and denominator 1,215" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>45</mn><mo>)</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>55</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mtext>,</mtext><mn>215</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 45 and denominator 1,215" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>45</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mtext>,</mtext><mn>215</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the square root of the fraction with numerator 45 and denominator 1,215" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>45</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mtext>,215</mtext></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 45 and denominator the square root of 1,215" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>45</mn></mrow><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mn>1</mn><mtext>,</mtext><mn>215</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="1.96 times, open parenthesis, the fraction with numerator 45 and denominator the square root of 1,215, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1.96</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>45</mn></mrow><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mn>1</mn><mtext>,</mtext><mn>215</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator 45 and denominator the square root of 1,215" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>45</mn></mrow><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mn>1</mn><mtext>,</mtext><mn>215</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 7.2: Constructing a Confidence Interval for a Population Mean

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Construct a confidence interval, provided conditions for inference are met.
